title: Unable to connect to server.
body:
Every time i try to join a game, the screen goes black before the loading screen, and i get a popup that says "Unable to Connect to Server. Please check your internet connection and reconnect to game." The rest of my internet is working just fine. I tried downloading the Hextech repair tool and opening the ports as described in this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fkxhsxaqkPI

Not sure what else to try. Thanks for your help.

Hey, you should check out my thread, I just posted it as I was having similar issues, maybe this can resolve it.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/pYPLZolo-rads-error-the-easiest-fix-should-work-for-everyone

This black screen happens when your connection is struggling to get to our game server, and fails to download assets.  You'll want to in this case go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Test it in a custom game, though, to prevent any leaverbuster penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Hey there. Got it fixed. A few weeks ago, in order to fix a issue with chat loading, I opened ports 5000 - 5500 on my router, as suggested in the video i referenced in my OP. Doing so solved the chat issue, and I was able to play games without complications. To solve my new connection issue today, i simply deleted the entry I made last week changing the port settings. I have now played a few games and it seems to be working correctly. Thank you for your response!
